name: Marvel Heroes Omega - Black Bolt Pack
name_original: Marvel Heroes Omega - Black Bolt Pack
description:
FOR A LIMITED TIME ONLY - INSTANTLY UNLOCK BLACK BOLT, 1 BONUS COSTUME, 2 MARVELOUS LOOT BOXES, AND 2 EXPERIENCE BOOSTS AT A DISCOUNT!

Pack Includes:

Playable Black Bolt: Experiencing terrigenesis before he was born, Blackagar Boltagon was granted frighteningly destructive powers. With a voice strong enough to destroy whole worlds, he reluctantly inherited the mantle of King of the Inhumans. Though he justly serves the people of Attilan through the wise words his council, he chooses his own words to protect Attilan from those who would put the Inhumans in danger.

1 Bonus Costume: Receive Black Bolt’s costume inspired by Marvel’s Inhumans guaranteed.

2 Marvelous Loot Boxes: Each Marvelous Loot Box contains chances to get crafting materials, Boosts, and more useful items, as well as extremely rare exclusive costumes and flourishes.

2 XP Boosts: Level up faster with a healthy dose of pure experience boost.

1-2 players
Network Players 2-99
